name: Advanced Energy Industries, Inc.
description: Advanced Energy Industries, Inc. is a global leader in precision power conversion solutions, specializing in the design and manufacturing of innovative technologies for the semiconductor, industrial, and telecommunications sectors. Founded in 1981 and headquartered in Fort Collins, Colorado, the company focuses on delivering high-performance power systems that enhance the efficiency and reliability of its customers' operations. Advanced Energy's product portfolio includes power supplies, thermal management solutions, and renewable energy products, serving a diverse range of applications including semiconductor manufacturing, industrial heating, and renewable energy generation. The company is committed to sustainability and innovation, striving to create energy-efficient solutions that reduce environmental impact. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Advanced Energy continuously invests in cutting-edge technologies to stay ahead in a competitive market. The company has a global footprint, with operations and support facilities strategically located worldwide to meet the needs of its customers. Advanced Energy aims to empower its clients with the tools and technologies necessary to thrive in an increasingly energy-conscious world.
